document_data.mainbody:
Just Reward was the personal weapon of the avatars of Osiris, the Mulhorandi deity of death.
This weapon resembled a ceremonial flail. Accounts varied on whether it was equivalent to a light horsemans flail or a heavy footmans flail, though the harm it caused was far greater than both.
Just Reward carried a +3 enchantment and had the same powers as a mace of disruption.
